tools.name: Apache Tika
tools.summary: The Apache Tika™ toolkit detects and extracts metadata and structured text content from various documents using existing parser libraries.

tools.name: PhantomJS
tools.summary: PhantomJS is a headless WebKit scriptable with a JavaScript API. It has fast and native support for various web standards: DOM handling, CSS selector, JSON, Canvas, and SVG.
tools.details: PhantomJS is a headless WebKit scriptable with a JavaScript API. It has fast and native support for various web standards: DOM handling, CSS selector, JSON, Canvas, and SVG.

tools.name: Portia
tools.summary: Portia is a tool for visually scraping web sites without any programming knowledge. Just annotate web pages with a point and click editor to indicate what data you want to extract, and portia will learn how to scrape similar pages from the site. Portia has a web based UI served by a Twisted server, so you can install it on almost any modern platform.

tools.name: Scraper - Google Chrome Extension
tools.summary: Scraper is a simple data mining extension for Google Chrome™ that is useful for online research when you need to quickly analyze data in spreadsheet form.
tools.details: Scraper is a simple data mining extension for Google Chrome™ that is useful for online research when you need to quickly analyze data in spreadsheet form.

tools.name: Scrapy
tools.summary: Scrapy is a fast high-level screen scraping and web crawling framework, used to crawl websites and extract structured data from their pages. It can be used for a wide range of purposes, from data mining to monitoring and automated testing.
